text: This is a list of heads of state of Eritrea. The office of President was created in 1993. The office has been held by Isaias Afwerki, since the office's creation. ==List== Portrait Name Elected Term of office Political party Took office Left office Time in office • Provisional Government of Eritrea (1991–1993) • 1 Isaias Afwerki — 27 April 1991 24 May 1993 EPLF • State of Eritrea (1993–present) • 1 Isaias Afwerki — 24 May 1993 Incumbent PFDJ ==Time in office== Image Name Term in office Political party Start term End term Time in office 1 Isaias Afwerki 27 April 1991 24 May 1993 EPLF 1 Isaias Afwerki 24 May 1993 Incumbent PFDJ ==Notes== ==References== *
title: List of heads of state of Eritrea
